atham madhya mudalalila paudgalika nyayapathrayan thama madhya aayathana haraha kriyathmaka karamin prawruththiyaka pramukhathwaya ha wadagathkama amathaka kara ediriwadikam ha hithawathkam matha madhya meheyawana bawa janamadhya ha prawruththi amathya keheliya rambaukwalla mahatha pawasayi.madhya nidahasa pilibandawa rajayata angili digu karana atham madhya thaman eya ee aakarayen surakinne da yanna thamangenma prashna kala yuthu bawada ee mahatha kiweya.rajaye prawruththi departhamenthuwe meheyawimen pereda (01) mahanuwara ookre hotalaye di disthrik sanwardhanaye di pradeshiya madhyawediyage karyabharaya mayen pawathi wadamuluwe di amathiwaraya me bawa prakasha kaleya.madhyawediya yanu mathawada wenas kala haki wadagath rajakariyak sidukarana ayaku bawath, atham madhya mudalalige madhya awa bhawithayata erehiwa nagisitiya yuththe madhyawedin ma bawath hethema awadharanaya kaleya.mema wadagath rajakariya kisiwakutath paudgalika aramunu wenuwen ayuthu lesa pawichchi karanna denna epa kiya thaman madhyawedingen illa sitina bawada amathiwaraya kiya.mehidi wadi duratath adahas dak wu amathi keheliya rambaukwalla mahatha,merata krida kshethraye mihirima awasthawa 96 api krikat loka kusalanaya dinapu awasthawayi.
